attr.title: Operius DX
attr.desc:
Blast off into Operius DX, the ultimate evolution of the popular, retro-inspired, high-speed arcade shooter, Operius!
Navigate twisting polygonal tunnels, battle endless waves of enemies, and face off against challenging bosses across infinite sectors. Each run in this game offers a fresh, action-packed challenge.
In a world where all computers have suddenly lost their internet connections, it’s up to you to enter the mysterious UFO looming in the sky, explore its depths, and reclaim digital freedom for all!
This enhanced version of the classic brings improved visuals, reworked difficulty, new game modes, new color schemes, and much more!  
Note: Currently only works with the Itch.io version
attr.desc_md:
Blast off into Operius DX, the ultimate evolution of the popular, retro-inspired, high-speed arcade shooter, Operius!
Navigate twisting polygonal tunnels, battle endless waves of enemies, and face off against challenging bosses across infinite sectors. Each run in this game offers a fresh, action-packed challenge.
In a world where all computers have suddenly lost their internet connections, it’s up to you to enter the mysterious UFO looming in the sky, explore its depths, and reclaim digital freedom for all!
This enhanced version of the classic brings improved visuals, reworked difficulty, new game modes, new color schemes, and much more!

**Note:**Currently only works with the Itch.io version
attr.inst:
Ready to Run! Game comes with demo files courtesy of Mors!  
For the full game, purchase and download operius-dx-windows.zip from Itch.io and place the zip in ports/operiusdx/ OR the game files into ports/operiusdx/assets.
attr.inst_md:
Ready to Run! Game comes with demo files courtesy of Mors!  
For the full game, purchase and download operius-dx-windows.zip from [Itch.io](https://distantillusions.itch.io/operius-dx) and place the zip in ports/operiusdx/ OR the game files into ports/operiusdx/assets.
